Articles.Content:
Hi, I really need some help with my mods...

 

I have installed 5 mods but only 2 of them actually work.

The working mods are Kerbal Engineer Redux and Mechjeb

The mods that aren't working are Planetary Base Systems, Near Future Spacecraft Parts and Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux

All of the latest versions of the mods have been installed

I have removed the Gamedata folders from the downloads and put them into the main GameData folder, so I assume I have installed them correctly

Any help at all would be greatly appreciated
Do you have Module Manager installed? A lot of mods need it even if it isn't listed as a dependency.

I have just installed module manager, and unfortunately it didn't work out as hoped.

I have made sure that the .dll module manager files in the mods have been deleted (except for the module manager mod, of course)

Perhaps is it because the mods are outdated, and I just need to delete some of them for the others to work?

1 minute ago, _RAZe said:

I have just installed module manager, and unfortunately it didn't work out as hoped.

I have made sure that the .dll module manager files in the mods have been deleted (except for the module manager mod, of course)

Perhaps is it because the mods are outdated, and I just need to delete some of them for the others to work?

The mods you describe should work together. It sounds like you have installation problems. I prefer CKAN when possible as it takes less personal interaction from my part, but not all mods support it.

If you want more help you need to be more descriptive about what's going wrong other than "it's not working" What symptoms are you seeing? Also we would need to see logs. I prefer the KSP.log in the game's install directory but other prefer the output_log.txt

I have just installed CKAN like you recommended and it works a treat!!

Thank you for your support in this matter, as the mods now work perfectly.

Thanks again!!

6 hours ago, _RAZe said:

I have removed the Gamedata folders from the downloads and put them into the main GameData folder, so I assume I have installed them correctly

Did you put their GameData folders into yours, or did you put the contents of their GameData folders into yours?
